scripts.scrape: npm run scrape:environment && npm run scrape:direct
scripts.scrape:deploy: export CI=true && npm run scrape:environment && playwright test --config='dspro/1_data_collection/playwright.config.ts' --project=chromium-stealth
scripts.python:prepare:full: pip3 install poetry==1.8.3 && poetry install && poetry run pre-commit install
scripts.python:prepare: echo This command assumes poetry was already installed, otherwise run python:prepare:full. && poetry install && poetry run pre-commit install
scripts.pdf:prepare:default: echo 'Unsupported OS. Please install Pandoc and BasicTeX manually.'
scripts.pdf:prepare:win32: choco install pandoc && choco install miktex && echo "Please restart your terminal."
scripts.pdf:prepare:darwin: brew install pandoc && curl -L https://mirror.ctan.org/systems/mac/mactex/MacTeX.pkg -o MacTeX.pkg && open MacTeX.pkg && echo 'MacTeX installed, please manually delete the installer using rm MacTeX.pkg when done.' && echo 'Please restart your terminal.'
scripts.pdf:prepare:linux: if command -v apt-get >/dev/null; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y pandoc texlive-full; elif command -v yum >/dev/null; then sudo yum update && sudo yum install -y pandoc texlive-full; else echo 'No supported package manager found. Please install pandoc and texlive-full manually.'; fi && echo "Please restart your terminal."
scripts.pdf:replace-newlines:default: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const filePath = './deliverables/ScientificReport/scientific_report_temp.md'; fs.readFile(filePath, 'utf8', (err, data) => { if (err) throw err; const result = data.replace(/\\\n/g, '\n'); fs.writeFile(filePath, result, 'utf8', (err) => { if (err) throw err; }); });"
scripts.pdf:replace-newlines:win32: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const filePath = './deliverables/ScientificReport/scientific_report_temp.md'; fs.readFile(filePath, 'utf8', (err, data) => { if (err) throw err; const result = data.replace(/\\n/g, '\n'); fs.writeFile(filePath, result, 'utf8', (err) => { if (err) throw err; }); });"
scripts.pdf:export:default: cp ./deliverables/ScientificReport/scientific_report.md ./deliverables/ScientificReport/scientific_report_temp.md && yarn pdf:replace-images:default && pandoc ./deliverables/ScientificReport/scientific_report_temp.md --template ./deliverables/ScientificReport/.assets/eisvogel.latex --output ./deliverables/ScientificReport/scientific_report.pdf --from markdown --citeproc --csl ./deliverables/ScientificReport/.assets/apa.csl && rm ./deliverables/ScientificReport/scientific_report_temp.md
scripts.pdf:export:win32: copy .\deliverables\ScientificReport\scientific_report.md .\deliverables\ScientificReport\scientific_report_temp.md && yarn pdf:replace-images:default && pandoc .\deliverables\ScientificReport\scientific_report_temp.md --template .\deliverables\ScientificReport\.assets\eisvogel.latex --output .\deliverables\ScientificReport\scientific_report.pdf --from markdown --citeproc --csl .\deliverables\ScientificReport\.assets\apa.csl && del .\deliverables\ScientificReport\scientific_report_temp.md
